io.atomix.primitive

Interface SyncPrimitive

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DistributedPrimitive
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AtomicCounter, AtomicCounterMap<K>, AtomicDocumentTree<V>, AtomicIdGenerator, AtomicLock, AtomicMap<K,V>, AtomicMultimap<K,V>, AtomicNavigableMap<K,V>, AtomicSemaphore, AtomicSortedMap<K,V>, AtomicValue<V>, DistributedCollection<E>, DistributedCounter, DistributedCyclicBarrier, DistributedList<E>, DistributedLock, DistributedMap<K,V>, DistributedMultimap<K,V>, DistributedMultiset<E>, DistributedNavigableMap<K,V>, DistributedNavigableSet<E>, DistributedQueue<E>, DistributedSet<E>, DistributedSortedMap<K,V>, DistributedSortedSet<E>, DistributedValue<V>, LeaderElection<T>, LeaderElector<T>, Transaction, TransactionalMap<K,V>, TransactionalSet<E>, WorkQueue<E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DistributedSemaphore, Synchronous

    public interface SyncPrimitive
extends DistributedPrimitive
    Synchronous primitive.

      default void delete()

    • Method Detail

      • delete

        default void delete()
        Purges state associated with this primitive.

        Implementations can override and provide appropriate clean up logic for purging any state state associated with the primitive. Whether modifications made within the destroy method have local or global visibility is left unspecified.

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the primitive.

        AsyncPrimitive async()
        Returns the underlying asynchronous primitive.

        the underlying asynchronous primitive
